definition: dead person/(coll.) to die/(of a death) to happen
constantly comparing oneself to others will only make one angry (proverb)
pinyin: ren2 bi3 ren2 , qi4 si3 ren2

definition: (coll.) to wash one's hands of a matter

sentences.english: The sight of the dead man made his hair stand on end.
sentences.chinese: 看到死人吓得他毛骨悚然。

sentences.english: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.
sentences.chinese: 他们必在那将要审判活人死人的主面前交帐。

sentences.english: He and colleagues tested it using a cadaver hand.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的同事们用一只死人的手测试这台机器。

sentences.english: But possessions of the dead men were found on Packer.
sentences.chinese: 但Packer身上藏着的这些死人的财产被发现了。

sentences.english: And when it had touched the bones of Eliseus, the man came to life, and stood upon his feet.
sentences.chinese: 那个死人一接触到厄里叟的骨骸，就复活站起来。

sentences.english: Was the bedside of such a dying man as that the proper place for a bishop?
sentences.chinese: 那种死人的病榻前也能成为主教涉足的地方吗？

sentences.english: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣说，任凭死人埋葬他们的死人，你跟从我吧。

sentences.english: Fresh bottles were brought, the dead men removed.
sentences.chinese: 新的瓶子被带来了，死人给抬出去了。

sentences.english: "A living man and a dead one, " said Zarathustra.
sentences.chinese: “一个活人和一个死人，”查拉图斯特拉说。

sentences.english: Drive your cart and your plow over the bones of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 大车和犁头的前行碾过死人的白骨。

sentences.english: Another helicopter crash. Dead mendon't t'sk.
sentences.chinese: 在另一个直升机坠毁中，死人不会说话。

sentences.english: A human skull was found here, that was much lager than normal size-hence the name .
sentences.chinese: 在这里曾经发现了一个死人的头骨。

sentences.english: This well where drank so many of the dead was destined to die itself.
sentences.chinese: 这口被许多死人喝过水的井也该同归于尽。

sentences.english: But the man was already dead and the patients were laughing to see the orderly trying to wake a dead man.
sentences.chinese: 病员们都笑那个护理员在叫一个死人醒过来。

sentences.english: Dead men hear no tales: posthumous fame is an Irish bull.
sentences.chinese: 死人无耳，死后名声有如风马牛。

sentences.english: Television news reporters are broadcasting stories of resurrections and miracle healings.
sentences.chinese: 电视新闻在报导死人复活及神迹医治等真人真事。

definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
sudden movement of a corpse (superstition)/fig. sudden torrent of abuse
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
